languages.text: {n}Лицо Маражая на мгновение становится растерянным, словно он осознал, что показал противнику слабую сторону. В следующую секунду он презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Не лезь мне под кожу, {name}. И не принимай прямоту за слабость".

{n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Маражая на мгновение становится растерянным, словно он осознал, что показал противнику слабую сторону. В следующую секунду он презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Не лезь мне под кожу, {name}. И не принимай прямоту за слабость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."

{n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."

{n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."

{n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的脸上闪过一丝惊慌，仿佛刚刚意识到自己向对手袒露了真正的心声。然而下一秒，他又轻蔑地哼了一声。{/n}“别想用激将法，{name}。坦诚并不意味着示弱。”
languages.original_text: {n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的脸上闪过一丝惊慌，仿佛刚刚意识到自己向对手袒露了真正的心声。然而下一秒，他又轻蔑地哼了一声。{/n}“别想用激将法，{name}。坦诚并不意味着示弱。”

languages.text: {n}Un atisbo de consternación asoma al rostro de Marazhai, como si cayese en la cuenta de que acaba de revelar una debilidad a su oponente. Pero enseguida resopla con desdén.{/n} «No pretendas buscarme las cosquillas, {name}. Y no confundas sinceridad con debilidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un atisbo de consternación asoma al rostro de Marazhai, como si cayese en la cuenta de que acaba de revelar una debilidad a su oponente. Pero enseguida resopla con desdén.{/n} «No pretendas buscarme las cosquillas, {name}. Y no confundas sinceridad con debilidad».

languages.text: {n}L'expression de Marazhai trahit son désarroi quand il réalise qu'il vient de dévoiler une faiblesse à son adversaire. Mais il se reprend en un clin d'œil et vous adresse un soupir dédaigneux.{/n} « Ne me cherchez pas, {name}. Et prenez garde à ne pas confondre franchise et faiblesse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression de Marazhai trahit son désarroi quand il réalise qu'il vient de dévoiler une faiblesse à son adversaire. Mais il se reprend en un clin d'œil et vous adresse un soupir dédaigneux.{/n} « Ne me cherchez pas, {name}. Et prenez garde à ne pas confondre franchise et faiblesse. »

languages.text: {n}In Marazhais Augen blitzt ein Anflug von Bestürzung auf, als hätte er bemerkt, dass er seinem Gegner gerade eine Schwäche offenbart hat. Kurz darauf schnaubt er abfällig.{/n} "Versucht nicht mich zu verunsichern, {name}. Und verwechselt meine Offenheit nicht mit Schwäche."
languages.original_text: {n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Marazhais Augen blitzt ein Anflug von Bestürzung auf, als hätte er bemerkt, dass er seinem Gegner gerade eine Schwäche offenbart hat. Kurz darauf schnaubt er abfällig.{/n} "Versucht nicht mich zu verunsichern, {name}. Und verwechselt meine Offenheit nicht mit Schwäche."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの顔に落胆の色がちらつく。まるで自分が敵に弱点を自ら露呈したと気づいたかのようだ。次の瞬間、彼は軽蔑したように鼻で笑った。{/n}「俺を苛つかせるなよ、{name}。そして、素直さと弱さを履き違えてはいけない」
languages.original_text: {n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの顔に落胆の色がちらつく。まるで自分が敵に弱点を自ら露呈したと気づいたかのようだ。次の瞬間、彼は軽蔑したように鼻で笑った。{/n}「俺を苛つかせるなよ、{name}。そして、素直さと弱さを履き違えてはいけない」

languages.original_text: {n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, . And do not mistake candour for weakness."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzüne, rakibine zayıflığını belli ettiğini fark edercesine bir telaş yayılıyor. Hemen ardından kibirle homurdanıyor.{/n} "Sinirimi bozmaya kalkma {name}. Samimiyeti zayıflıkla karıştırma."
languages.original_text: {n}Dismay flickers on Marazhai's face, as if he realises he has just revealed a weakness to his opponent. The next second, he snorts contemptuously.{/n} "Do not try to get under my skin, {name}. And do not mistake candour for weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzüne rakibine zayıflığını belli ettiğini fark edercesine bir telaş yayılıyor. Hemen ardından kibirle homurdanıyor.{/n} "Sinirimi bozmaya kalkma {name}. Ayrıca samimiyeti zayıflıkla karıştırma."
